name: Sci-Fi
overview: Sci-Fi is 2D arcade-style side-scrolling shoot'em up in "euroshmup" style. The player is "a guy with futuristic glasses" - only 1 pilot of "Vulcan 2" craft at Phobos Earth Base 3. Gameplay is very typical - he flies straightforward, shoots meteorites and (later - first level has almost only meteorites) various enemies. He can spot special ship-shop - this ship sells nine power-ups, like rapid or double fire. Each power-up costs, and the player gets the money from destroying objects. The player can use a special shot - holding button gives the effect of a stream of fire.
